text:
You are more famous with 'KG' than your real name-'Kushagra Gupta'.  Let's start with that,

Dear KG,
The most memorable time that we spent was playing MM (mostly during exams). You were the guy who always used to remain calm whatever the situation is. You also helped me to remain calm in the odds situation. We did a lot of fun with you. Selling your Bicycle for Rs11 on Buy and Sell group, taking treats for unknown reasons. Though you did gave your last CCD treat. Btw, it feels really good to meet you again last month. You are a good guy and  you will do good kid.
author: Mohit  Yadav

text: really passionate about entrepreneurship. bas ab jaldi se apna starup start kar de. Most known person of ME branch. ME branch ke prof and courses ko galliyane mein sabse aage. Doing great and hope you will maintain this stint in future. Aur ha bhai startup ME mein mat kar dena, warna hum log galliyenge tereko
author: Mohit  Yadav

text:
Pyare Panda,
Yaar you are a really good person. Har time sabki help karte ho phir woh food, assignment, ya kuch bhi ho. Your passion for Aero designing is really commendable. You alone designed the alone whole aero package for Shell Eco. It's a shame that it was the only subsystem that got completed. Sabse jyada toh yaar muje apne Baja ke time Nightout yaad atte. The most memorable is the night that we spend building Nosecone, you lead us through the whole process. I will really miss the time that all of us spend while manufacturing Baja. Baaki yaar tum abhi March mein ae nhi warna thodi aur memories banate and sab mil lete. koi nhi COVID ke baad sab SAE wale 1 trip plan karte, tab saare maje dobara karte hai.
author: Mohit  Yadav

text:
SOLIDWORKS and ANSYS GOD, I really enjoyed the time we spent in SAE. Aur bhai ME ke saare assignment toh tu hi bhejta tha. Course se related koi bhi help ho kabhi mna nhi karta tha. 

Straight forward person, Korean song lover with hidden Dance talent. Hope will meet again.
author: Mohit  Yadav
